title: Societal Cost Analysis of a Community-Based Teledermatology Service versus Conventional Outpatient Appointments in East Kent: A Retrospective Study to Reduce …
details: NA Nizar, R Farooki, P Mahapatra, S Halpern… - 2024
abstract: Background The UK's National Health Service (NHS) is grappling with rising demand and limited dermatologists, leading to longer waiting times. This is particularly concerning for conditions like malignant melanoma, where early diagnosis is crucial …
